dct_description_sm: Issued in his: Philippi Cluveri introductionis in universam geographiam, London, 1711.

With cartouche of draped cloth held by winged cherub; with Iohn Senex sculpt.; C Fortuna, P S F Drake, C S Martin among labelled places on California, and Fretum Anian and Anian to north. No ship vignette.

California with flat northern coast, and place names Nova Albion, P S Franc[isco] Draco, C de Pinas, C de S Martin, C de Galera, Pueblo de la Cansas. Straet Anian and Anian to north. Great Lakes are missing. Partial outline of Zelandia Nova, Iapan, and Ieso are included.
